Literature.Title: Antiviral Action against SARS-CoV-2 of a Synthetic Peptide Based on a Novel Defensin Present in the Transcriptome of the Fire Salamander ( Salamandra salamandra)
Literature.Author: Barros ALAN, da Silva VC, Ribeiro-Junior AF, Cardoso MG, Costa SR, Moraes CB, Barbosa CG, Coleone AP, Simões RP, Cabral WF, Falcão RM, Vasconcelos AG, Rocha JA, Arcanjo DDR, Batagin-Neto A, Borges TKS, Gonçalves JC, Brand GD, Freitas-Junior LHG, Eaton P, Marani MM, Kato MJ, Plácido A, Leite JRSA

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:90% Hemolysis=1-10 µM,Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=100 µM,Vero-CCL-81 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=10 µM,Human microglial cells HMC20:15% Cytotoxicity=5 µM,Human microglial cells HMC20:21% Cytotoxicity=10 µM,Human microglial cells HMC20:50% Cytotoxicity=100 µM
